messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/7/2002 12:10:00 PM Central Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:


> Baptists are "low church." Church hierarchy and ritual aren't important, or
>
> are all internal to each congregation (deacons are good; there are no
> bishops, arch-bishops, etc. outside that congregation with authority
> though).
>
> Sandra
>

Dang..... I didn't know that there was a high or a low church kind of
thing......
Thanks for that lesson......

Kim
